blocks.text: Control categories describe the mechanism used to implement a control.

items: Technical control: implemented by technology (configuration settings, encryption, firewall rules, antivirus).
Managerial control / administrative control: implemented through policies, standards, procedures, and governance (security policy, onboarding rules, compliance expectations).
Operational control: implemented by people and routine processes (guard patrols, awareness training, incident reporting steps).
Physical control: implemented with tangible barriers/devices (locks, fences, badge reader, motion detector).
Firewall rule blocking inbound access → technical control.
Written onboarding/offboarding and access request procedures → managerial control.
Security guards checking identification → operational control.
Door locks and turnstiles to a server room → physical control.
